title: Solving for Y in the First Equation
text: First, solve the first equation for $$y$$.

title: Subsituting in Y
text: Replace $$y$$ in the second equation with the value solved from the first equation.

title: Solving a One-Variable Equation
text: After subsituting in y's value from the first equation, the second equation now has only one variable, $$x$$. Solve for $$x$$.

title: Using One Variable to Solve for Another
text: Using the numerical value of $$x$$, plug $$x$$ back into the original first equation to solve for the numerical value of $$y$$.

title: Checking Values
text: Subsitute the values back into the original equations to make sure they are true.
